extendedInfo.description: Start fridaying to make your memories last forever !Friday is just like your brain. It captures events happening around you. The people you talk to, the places you visit, the images you capture, and the songs you listen to, etc. And like your brain, it initiates thoughts and ideas for you, it helps you remember information, it tries to anticipate actions.Friday is not just a backup service, on the contrary, it collates all the information including your location, people / contacts, moments, music, pictures, facebook, twitter and foursquare (social) feeds, apart from your calls, texts and mails to present you with a digitized form of memory which is searchable. In essence, friday becomes your best friend or an alter-ego with full access to your memory and important events. With friday activities, you can share or, just log your favorite activities you've been doing all day.Friday helps you forget to remember. The app does the remembering for you.PERMISSIONS===========ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION, ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION - Journaling your tracks and trips. android.permission.INTERNET, ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE - Cloud Syncing, viewing etc. READ_CONTACTS - For quick actions, people display on timeline etc.READ_CALL_LOG, READ_SMS, RECEIVE_SMS - To sync your calls and Texts. WAKE_LOCK - Use display and processor time efficiently, yet keeping your timeline fresh.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - Cache resources (Images, contact pictures etc) on SD card.MANAGE_ACCOUNTS, AUTHENTICATE_ACCOUNTS, WRITE_SYNC_SETTINGS, READ_SYNC_SETTINGS - Create and maintain a 'friday' sync account and service.GET_TASKS - To scroble the music player and sync your song logs.

reviews.title: Priceless
reviews.comment: All my life in one place. Actually not,  but on the way to.  Good work, guys! Please, add more events, physical activities, voice tagging, and settings to more often location logging!
reviews.author: Alex Kostyrya

reviews.title: Decent start
reviews.comment: To be truly useful needs more tie-ins with phone functions and apps (eg other camera apps, messaging apps, ebooks read, websites visitied, google+, etc). Instances is a weird and unexplained feature.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A unique approach in summarizing one\'s life
reviews.comment: Till now it has lived upto my expectation and i hope the algorithm gets bttr...
reviews.author: Aditya Nath

reviews.title: Unable to sign in:PARSE ERROR
reviews.comment: Iam not able to sign into this app .it is throwing Parse error. Some one help
reviews.author: Goutham k

reviews.title: Me encanta esta aplicacion!!
reviews.comment: Va recordando los lugares en los que estas, quien habia, tus fotos, a quien llamas y cuando, y se queda todo guardado en tu movil! Luego te resulta facilisimo recordar que hiciste un dia, donde y con quien! Esto y mucho mas! Es genial
reviews.author: Irene Sanchez

reviews.title: The best app to index your phone
reviews.comment: I like how this app index your interaction with devices and let you search your past interaction. No more headache backing up phone/sms/calls history.
reviews.author: Bing Han Goh

reviews.title: Sign In Problem
reviews.comment: Incorrect log in/user not found when I try to sign in. what happen?

reviews.title: Bravo and one of the most Innovative apps
reviews.comment: This should give u a thumbs up and the way you guys implement this app into Android. Love it so much!
reviews.author: Justin Wong Kang Zheng

reviews.comment: Stop Working on the Contextual Caller Identification or Whatever You Call..\tHey:  This thing sucks. Period. Your sucking algorithm could never figure out whom I\'d be calling. Not even once in 1000 contexts.  A simple tip: If you want to make money, just wash your contextual crap down the drain.   P.S: There is no option to rate it below one star! Boo.....
reviews.author: Sishir Sudabattula

reviews.title: Gets better all the time!
reviews.comment: But it\'s curtailed by inability to 1. Add multiple photos from gallery like other apps (Often 2 or 3 images comprise an event), and 2. Cannot edit entries!...like add notes to any entry (this is essential to a Lifestream) ; add photos to an existing event; Delete ANYthing etc..  Hopefully this is coming soon to an otherwise great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice but
reviews.comment: lags a bit too much.......not even usable......htc one(not bad at power(at all))
reviews.author: Naman Dhamija

reviews.title: No.
reviews.comment: Am i being an idiot or what? I cant actually view any info? I sync with Facebook and that is all... What\'s supposed to happen now? I\'ve got no menu options. Just 4 pages of settings. The icons for including/excluding calls/music/ messages/ pics are very,very, very ambiguous what is included in the sync and what is not? This app is just a data harvester and I\'ve fallen for it.  Curse you app you w@nker.  I really hate spyware apps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Add some Widgets
reviews.comment: Hi, Please add couple of widgets too, like to quickly add an activity.
reviews.author: basit ijaz

reviews.title: Excellent idea, needs improvement
reviews.comment: The app idea is excellent, but it supports only limited apps, like we use a lot other apps daily like instagram, browsing the web , etc. And it would be a nice addition to add the amount of time the screen was kept on, this would approximately show our daily smartphone usage. Another bug is that there is no option for manual syncing, the manual synchronising in the settings menu doesn\342\200\231t work, the only thing that works is the sync toggle in the notification area.
reviews.author: Pratyush Deb

reviews.title: AWESOME
reviews.comment: Finally found the app to remind me everything... needs security like app-locking
reviews.author: mohammad imad

reviews.title: Nice Logger... But....
reviews.comment: Not being able to add notes and photos to items already entered or editing them makes this very incomplete as an accurate logger. Much remains unfinished!  Also please extract any  images from emails, text messages,  Web items and Facebook items shared in and use as thumbnails/pics. This would personalize and bring the UI face to life!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: cool
reviews.comment: would be great if it collected data from various site that i log in it only records what i do with the phone thats all

reviews.title: It\'s accuracy is haunting...
reviews.comment: Never fails to impress. The longer I use the more accurate it gets

reviews.title: Google plus?
reviews.comment: Sign in with Google but why doesn\'t it show any social event on Google plus? I had more activities on Google than FB.

reviews.comment: A GREAT App... Keep going
